Duplicate Content Test

This site contains multiple copies of the same files to test content-addressed deduplication.

Identical Files (should dedupe to 1 blob)

  • shared.css (original)
  • copy1/shared.css (identical)
  • copy2/shared.css (identical)
  • copy3/shared.css (identical)

Identical HTML (should dedupe)

  • copy1/page.html
  • copy2/page.html
  • copy3/page.html

Expected: 10 files uploaded, but only ~4 unique blobs stored.
